outline:
1. to pour out, pour, offer, cast
    1. (Qal)
      1. to pour out
      2. to cast metal images
      3. to anoint (a king)
    2. (Niphal) to be anointed
    3. (Piel) to pour out (as a libation)
    4. (Hiphil) to pour out libations
    5. (Hophal) to be poured out
  2. to set, install
    1. (Qal) to install
    2. (Niphal) to be installed
kjv_def: cover, melt, offer, (cause to) pour (out), set (up).
strongs_def: to pour out, especially a libation, or to cast (metal); by analogy, to anoint aking
